rules_text: Pursue Wonder. When you do, destroy up to one target creature with mana value greater than or equal to the revealed card. [i](To pursue Wonder, reveal a basic land or Wonder card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]Animals living in the Wonderlands grow more attuned to it over time, their size and intelligence heightening as they approach total subsumption.[/i]
